column4: ﻿kopichu just a guess but try putting your ubuntu box into same workgroup

﻿Ubuntu 8.04 / onboard graphic card VGA compatible controller: VIA Technologies, Inc. K8M890 [Chrome9] Integrated Video (rev 11) @256 MB Shared Memory (direct rendering not supported) / Using chrome open source drivers / Can someone give me some good hints for xorg.conf and drivers, witch one should i use for best performance, need to speed up 2d, its very slow at the moment... (compiz-fusion is disabled), ﻿here my xorg.conf http://de.pastebin.ca/
you'll need the url that has numbers and/or letters at the end.
http://de.pastebin.ca/ is just the service. it would have given you a special link instead.
